name: Screenshot Capture
description: Capture screenshots with region selection and built-in editing tools. Perfect for creating annotated images and snippets.
author: Screenshot Plugin Developer

en.name: Screenshot Capture
en.description: Capture screenshots with region selection and built-in editing tools. And use LLM to analyze them.

zh.name: 截图捕获
zh.description: 通过区域选择和内置编辑工具捕获屏幕截图。使用LLM分析它们。
